# Copilot Instructions

This document contains instructions on how to use GitHub Copilot in the project.

## Installation

1. Install the GitHub Copilot plugin in your IDE.
2. Sign in with your GitHub account.

## Usage

- Start typing code, and Copilot will suggest completions.
- You can accept suggestions using the TAB key.

## Troubleshooting

- If suggestions are not appearing, ensure your IDE is up to date and the plugin is enabled.
